control.visible: [Control.IsVisible(51) | Control.IsVisible(55) | Control.IsVisible(56) | Control.IsVisible(57) | Control.IsVisible(58) | Control.IsVisible(59) | Control.IsVisible(61) | Control.IsVisible(62)] + [Container.Content(movies) + SubString(skin.string(widemovies.art),poster) | Container.Content(musicvideos)]

control.label: - $LOCALIZE[31298]
control.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(novideomediacase) + [Control.IsVisible(51) | Control.IsVisible(55) | Control.IsVisible(56) | Control.IsVisible(57) | Control.IsVisible(58) | Control.IsVisible(59) | Control.IsVisible(61) | Control.IsVisible(62)] + [Container.Content(movies) + SubString(skin.string(widemovies.art),poster) | Container.Content(musicvideos)]
Control.IsVisible(55) | Control.IsVisible(59) | Control.IsVisible(60) | Control.IsVisible(62) + Skin.HasSetting(noviewpanelposter) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows)]

control.enable: ![Skin.HasSetting(moviescurtains) + Container.Content(movies) | Skin.HasSetting(tvshowscurtains) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)] | Skin.HasSetting(musicvideoscurtains) + Container.Content(musicvideos)]

control.label: $VAR[value_addon1_custom]
control.onclick: XBMC.RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, mediatype=tvshow, dbid=$INFO[ListItem.DBID], poster, seasonposter, fanart, extrafanart, extrathumbs, clearlogo, clearart, tvthumb, seasonthumb, banner, seasonbanner, characterart)
XBMC.RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, mediatype=movie, dbid=$INFO[ListItem.DBID], poster, fanart, extrafanart, extrathumbs, clearlogo, clearart, discart, thumb, banner)
XBMC.RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, dbid=$INFO[ListItem.DBID], poster, fanart, extrafanart, extrathumbs, clearlogo, clearart, discart)
